quotes.quote: I'm going to make you an offer you can't refuse.
quotes.author: Abdulsamed Ünal

quotes.quote: This was an experience that shaped the future.
quotes.author: Arif Mertcan Kara

quotes.quote: No matter what they say, words and thoughts can change the world.
quotes.author: Asena Gürbüz

quotes.quote: Luke I'm your father!
quotes.author: Atakan Talay

quotes.quote: Rules are made to be broken...like the Earth! or the whole Galaxy!! ^^
quotes.author: Bartu Sarıpınarlı

quotes.quote: Happiness is gained through knowledge!
quotes.author: Batuhan Uluğ Yücel

quotes.quote: If someone from the future isn't coming to stop you, how bad can your decision be?
quotes.author: Berkay Karslı

quotes.quote:
I am not in danger,
 I am the danger.
quotes.author: Çağdaş Bilgin

quotes.quote: This is how superheros make money.
quotes.author: Derya Özgür

quotes.quote: Your fate is your hands.
quotes.author: Diana Ekinci

quotes.quote: Thumbs up !!
quotes.author: Dilara Tok

quotes.quote: Show must go on!!
quotes.author: Ebru Terzioğlu

quotes.quote: Kahramanbrush
quotes.author: Emre Sinan Sayın

quotes.quote:
Be positive 'cause 
"A little party never killed nobody."
quotes.author: Eren Kumru

quotes.quote:
Don't forget that 
 I'm human, don't forget that I'm real.
quotes.author: Ezgi Dar

quotes.quote: Love is love.
quotes.author: Furkan Balkaç

quotes.quote: Less talk let's code!
quotes.author: Halil Çoşgun

quotes.quote: Only the dead have seen the end of war.
quotes.author: Ilkin Mammadzada

quotes.quote:
Shut up baby, 
I know it!
quotes.author: İsmail Yazıcı

quotes.quote: You're as good as what you 'hyde' inside.
quotes.author: Kübra ilhan

quotes.quote: Why are you wearing that stupid bunny suit?
quotes.author: Kürşat Erdoğan

quotes.quote: The dwarf animation.
quotes.author: Mehmet Mücahit Doğan

quotes.quote: It's like the Champions League inside!!
quotes.author: Mertcan Aslan

quotes.quote: Tatar is everywhere.
quotes.author: Muhammet Serhat Tatar

quotes.quote: Do it today, or regret it tomorrow!
quotes.author: Nasibe Kübra Baranlı

quotes.quote: Empathy, it will save the galaxy.
quotes.author: Nisa Nur Yalçınkaya

quotes.quote: Now I am become Death, the destroyer of worlds!
quotes.author: Oğuzhan Akbulut

quotes.quote: If you're not having fun with what you're doing then you're doing it wrong.
quotes.author: Oktay Türkdağlı

quotes.quote: Fear is the mind-killer.
quotes.author: Orhun Acar

quotes.quote: Hey sky, take off your hat, I'm on my way!
quotes.author: Ozan Yücel

quotes.quote: "Many that live deserve death,and some that die deserve life..."
quotes.author: Özge Aydın

quotes.quote: For not all tears are an evil.
quotes.author: Özlem Yıkılkan

quotes.quote: Now it's time to leave the capsule if you dare.
quotes.author: Şefika Özge Salman

quotes.quote: Thicc thighs save lives.
quotes.author: Tanya Sena Kocatürkmen

quotes.quote: Some men just want to watch the world burn.
quotes.author: Şennur Yektay

quotes.quote: The fate you were waiting for was right next to you, watching your mistakes.
quotes.author: Uygar Çankaya

quotes.quote: You were wonderful! With love.
